hadiths.text: It was narrated from ‘Awn bin Abu Juhaifah, from his father, that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Whoever sees me in a dream, it is as if he has seen me when he is awake, for Satan is not able to resemble me.”

chapter.ara-name: باب رُؤْيَةِ النَّبِيِّ ـ صلى الله عليه وسلم ـ فِي الْمَنَامِ
chapter.eng-name: Seeing the Prophet (ﷺ) in a Dream
